item.title: Star Trek: How Long Khan Was Stranded & Why He Hated Kirk So Much
item.description: Star Trek: Khan is a new audio series exploring the genetically engineered tyrant's life on Ceti Alpha V, but how long did Kirk leave him there?

item.title: Jean-Claude Van Damme's 1988 Classic With 74% On Rotten Tomatoes Is Still One Of The Best American-Made Martial Arts Movies Ever
item.description: Jean-Claude Van Damme is one of Hollywood's most legendary martial arts actors, and one of his movies still deserves its place among the genre's best.

item.title: Milla Jovovich's New Action Fantasy Movie Could Help Replace A $1.2 Billion Franchise That Ended 8 Years Ago
item.description: Milla Jovovich and Paul W.S. Anderson are reuniting once again for In the Lost Lands, which could be a replacement for the pair's biggest franchise.
